text:
The number of recommended H1 tags for website pages came up during the DHUG event today - HubSpot still suggests only 1, but Google has confirmed multiple are okay (so long as you use proper hierarchy for your headings on the page).

I added <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Remove-the-SEO-suggestion-limiting-a-page-to-a-single-H1-tag/idi-p/664048|this idea> almost 3 years ago, maybe time to upvote and see some improvement with the on page recommendations :upside_down_face:
